newsitem.title: UK: World Bank sets C$100 mln December 2002 bond.
newsitem.headline: World Bank sets C$100 mln December 2002 bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by joint lead managers Deutsche Morgan grenfell and Hambros.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.015 PAY DATE S-27.JUL.97
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ ANNUAL

NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES

NOTES ISSUED OFF MULTI CURRENCY PROGRAMME
